code: @Override public String getMessage() {     return "Missing request header '" + this.headerName + "' for method parameter of type " + this.parameter.getNestedParameterType().getSimpleName(). }

comment: /**  * Return the expected name of the request header.  */
code: /**  * Return the expected name of the request header.  */ public final String getHeaderName() {     return this.headerName. }

comment: /**  * Return the method parameter bound to the request header.  */
code: /**  * Return the method parameter bound to the request header.  */ public final MethodParameter getParameter() {     return this.parameter. }
